Text: Thank you very much! So glad someone finally torrented this release.

These are amazing. Finally no PAL Speedup ruining the audio, and the x264 encode is almost imperceptible.

One Question though. What does JCH stand for?

FYI... Episodes 2-19 are actually episodes 3-20, for those who care. Episode 1 is 2 hours long and was originally aired as episodes #1 and #2. If you use MediaBrowser or anything that fetches metadata from the internet, you'll need to change the names.
No this is the real name for NTSC version for USA ;)

Excellent torrent and quality.
Keep it up.
